create_plan.description: Creates a new plan for use when creating or updating subscriptions

props.name: source_id
props.description: Select the data source (Payment Provider or API)

props.name: oid
props.description: Your unique ID for this plan

props.name: name
props.description: Your internal name for this plan. This will be displayed in the Plan Breakout section

props.name: currency
props.description: The ISO code of the currency of this plan (e.g., USD)

props.name: amount
props.description: How much is this plan? (In cents)

props.name: interval
props.description: Billing interval

props.name: interval_count
props.description: Number of intervals between billings (e.g., 1 for every month, 3 for every 3 months)

props.name: trial_duration
props.description: The duration of this trial

props.name: trial_duration_unit
props.description: Unit for trial duration

create_subscription.description: Creates a new subscription for a customer on a plan

props.name: source_id
props.description: Select the data source (Payment Provider or API)

props.name: oid
props.description: Your unique ID for this subscription

props.name: started_at
props.description: When this subscription started

props.name: canceled_at
props.description: When this subscription was or should be canceled (optional)

props.name: customer_oid
props.description: Select the customer for this subscription

props.name: plan_oid
props.description: Select the plan for this subscription

props.name: quantity
props.description: Number of subscriptions

props.name: discount
props.description: Discount amount (in the same currency as the plan)

props.name: addons
props.description: Additional charges to add to the base plan

props.name: oid
props.description: Your unique ID for this addon

props.name: amount
props.description: Addon amount (in cents)

props.name: quantity
props.description: Addon quantity

update_customer.description: Updates the basic information stored on a customer

props.name: source_id
props.description: Select the data source (Payment Provider or API)

props.name: customer_oid
props.description: Select the customer to update

props.name: name
props.description: Customer name

props.name: email
props.description: Email address for this customer

props.name: notes
props.description: Your own notes for this customer

props.name: created
props.description: Unix timestamp of when this customer was created
